BargainingMaster.name: Bargaining Master
BargainingMaster.description: Your keen business sense allows you to get better deals from merchants.

QuickLearner.name: Quick Learner
QuickLearner.description: You gain 15% more skill experience from all sources.

MentorsInsight.name: Mentor's Insight
MentorsInsight.description: Increases essence gained from all sources by 10%

BattleHardened.name: Battle Hardened
BattleHardened.description: Your combat experience grants you increased attack and defense capabilities.

EssenceSiphon.name: Essence Siphon
EssenceSiphon.description: You have a chance to gain essence when landing hits in combat.

RelationshipSage.name: Relationship Sage
RelationshipSage.description: Your actions have a greater impact on NPC relationships.

EssenceFlow.name: Essence Flow
EssenceFlow.description: Increases your essence generation rate from all sources.

CombatReflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
CombatReflexes.description: Increases your chance to dodge enemy attacks.

GrowingAffinity.name: Growing Affinity
GrowingAffinity.description: Automatically increases relationships with all NPCs by 1 point every minute.

WillowsWisdom.name: Willow's Wisdom
WillowsWisdom.description: Elder Willow's ancient knowledge increases your learning speed by 15%.

ScholarlyInsight.name: Scholarly Insight
ScholarlyInsight.description: Scholar Elara's teachings help you gain 10% more essence from knowledge-based activities.

ResilientConstitution.name: Resilient Constitution
ResilientConstitution.description: Your body is exceptionally tough, increasing your maximum health.

ArcaneIntellect.name: Arcane Intellect
ArcaneIntellect.description: Your mind is a wellspring of magical energy, increasing max mana and mana regeneration.

SwiftStrikes.name: Swift Strikes
SwiftStrikes.description: You attack with blinding speed, increasing attack speed and overall attack power.

IronWill.name: Iron Will
IronWill.description: Your resolve is unbreakable, significantly boosting your defense.

SilverTongue.name: Silver Tongue
SilverTongue.description: You have a way with words, making social interactions more favorable.

MasterCraftsman.name: Master Craftsman
MasterCraftsman.description: Your skill in crafting is unparalleled, yielding better quality items.

ShadowWalker.name: Shadow Walker
ShadowWalker.description: You move like a whisper in the dark, enhancing your stealth capabilities.

ElementalAffinity.name: Elemental Affinity
ElementalAffinity.description: You have a natural connection to the elements, boosting your magical damage.

LuckyCharm.name: Lucky Charm
LuckyCharm.description: Fortune seems to favor you, slightly increasing your critical hit chance.

TomeOfForbiddenKnowledge.name: Tome of Forbidden Knowledge
TomeOfForbiddenKnowledge.description: Unlocking secrets man was not meant to know. Grants immense power at a potential cost.

HeartOfTheMountain.name: Heart of the Mountain
HeartOfTheMountain.description: Your resilience is like stone, greatly increasing max health and defense.

WhispersOfTheVoid.name: Whispers of the Void
WhispersOfTheVoid.description: You hear faint whispers, granting insight but slightly unsettling your mind. Increases critical chance but may have minor negative side effects.
